title: GRACE: Graph-Based Contextual Debiasing for Fair Visual Question Answering (Supplementary Materials)
details: Y Zhang, M Jiang, Q Zhao
abstract: In our main paper, we have presented GRACE, a novel approach addressing biases in knowledge-based VQA. It surpasses current debiasing methods, which primarily tackle dataset biases but fall short in handling biases within the incontext learning …

title: Improving Self-Supervised Vision Transformers for Visual Control
details: W Song, K Sohn, D Min - 2024 IEEE International Conference on Image …, 2024
abstract: Despite the tremendous success of vision transformer (ViT) architectures in a broad range of computer vision tasks, the potential of ViT for vision-based deep reinforcement learning (RL) has not been fully explored yet. To improve the …
